title: About Sea Scout Ship 4
subtitle: Discover the adventure of Sea Scouting with Ship 4, where young mariners learn seamanship, leadership, and character while exploring the waters of Central Texas.

features.title: Leadership
features.description: Develop leadership skills through hands-on maritime experiences and team-building activities.

features.title: Seamanship
features.description: Learn essential boating skills, navigation, and water safety in a supportive environment.

features.title: Adventure
features.description: Experience exciting adventures on the water and participate in regional Sea Scout events.

whatToExpect: Event planning and community service projects
